roleset.name: to calm

example.name: transitive
example.text: However , at a news conference Thursday , Mrs. Aquino backed the project and said [0] [her government]-1 was attempting [*-1] to soothe the feelings of residents at the original site , adjacent to the government 's major petroleum refinery in Bataan province .
example.arg: the feelings of residents at the original site , adjacent to the government 's major petroleum refinery in Bataan province

roleset.note: Based on survey of sentences in WSJ. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1, force-59.
